name: Escape Memoirs: Mansion Heist
description:
"Escape Memoirs: Mansion Heist” is a co-operative reverse escape-room puzzle game, where you are a master thief hired to break into a mansion. You need to solve various puzzles as you try to complete the heist.

You must make good use of your wits if you are to overcome the various challenges you will encounter.

Features


  • Plenty of different kinds of puzzles from deductive reasoning to mechanical devices
  • A lot of hidden collectibles to find
  • Play solo or work together with friends, in up to 5-player multiplayer
